title: The Top 10 Most Played Tracks of Tomorrowland's First 2025 Weekend
description: Tracks by Martin Garrix, John Summit and more reverberated through a festival crowd united by a shared sense of profound appreciation after the destruction of Tomorrowland's Mainstage.

html:
Tracks by Martin Garrix, John Summit and more reverberated through a festival crowd united by a shared sense of profound appreciation after the destruction of Tomorrowland's Mainstage.

Tomorrowland

Tracks by Martin Garrix, John Summit and more reverberated through a festival crowd united by a shared sense of profound appreciation after the destruction of Tomorrowland's Mainstage.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

Tomorrowland has come and gone, but as usual, the memories are now starting to take shape in its afterglow.

The world's preeminent EDM festival returned to Belgium over the weekend and brought with it a new kind of unity, thanks to the tragic destruction of its iconic Mainstage after a massive fire tore through just two days prior. The towering "Orbyz" stage, which stood 147 feet tall and 524 feet wide, took two years to build, according to Tomorrowland spokesperson Debby Wilmsen.

The festival's organizers, however, pulled off a miracle after racing against the clock to construct a new Mainstage in time for the festival's first day, July 18th. In just 36 hours, they managed to develop a new stage with help from Metallica, whose team reportedly agreed to airlift elements from the legendary heavy metal band's M72 world tour stage that were being stored in Austria.

What followed was a festival united by a shared sense of profound appreciation not only for Tomorrowland, but the EDM community at large. Read on to listen to the most played tracks from the event's first weekend of 2025.

Tomorrowland returns to Boom, Belgium from July 25-27.

1.⁠ ⁠Cloonee, Young M.A. & InntRaw - Stephanie (HNTR and other remixes)

2.⁠ ⁠John Summit feat. HAYLA - Where You Are (Original and other remixes)

3.⁠ ⁠The Temper Trap - Sweet Disposition (Axwell & Dirty South Remix and other versions)

Scroll to Continue

4.⁠ ⁠Calvin Harris feat. Clementine Douglas - Blessings (Cassian Remix and other versions)

5.⁠ ⁠Argy & Omnya - Aria

6.⁠ ⁠Chris Lorenzo - Appetite

7.⁠ ⁠Martin Garrix & Third Party feat. Oaks & Declan - Carry You

8. David Guetta & Benny Benassi - Satisfaction (and other versions)

9.⁠ ⁠Pryda - Allein

10.⁠ ⁠Hatiras - Hypnotized
